# Revenue options

Possible themes for tax packages

-   Tax users of mass transportation system, in more-progressive way than fares

-   Tax users of alternatives to mass transportation

-   Tax owners/etc. of property that benefits from mass transportation

-   Broad-based taxes (all of society benefits from transportation)

    -   Close loopholes

    -   Broaden bases

    -   Outright increases

See [this spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1lzmDe7Zj1fQ4jDk9och5FPGFEMEYKkk2Og_UKkH0soY/edit#gid=0) for a template for individual items.
